name: Lego Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga Starkiller Update
storyline: Added as a free May 4th update Starkiller, inspired by Ralph Mcquarrie's concepts joins Lego star wars the skywalker saga
summary: For the uninitiated, Luke Starkiller is an early version of Luke Skywalker, as portrayed in concept artwork by Ralph McQuarrie, the designer and illustrator who helped to define the iconic look and style at the Star Wars universe.
